channel.title: Delete profiles when the profile isnt used for 2 years
channel.description:
Title says it,
Why dont we add a system that deletes profiles that aren't used for 1.5-2 years? People want usernames that already busy by people that never been on Moparscape.
Regards, - Ircdscape

item.title: Delete profiles when the profile isnt used for 2 years
item.dc:creator: @IrcdScape IrcdScape
item.description:
@IrcdScape wrote:

Yeah can be true , but my nickname in real is Rocky , i am nothing here if the name ‘Rocky’ is already busy by someone who didnt came back 2.5years ago? 0.o , that guy forgot his pass 9/10 …

Read full topic

item.title: Delete profiles when the profile isnt used for 2 years
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Nope. You never know when someone may come back

There are ways to give people that display name, but it’s case by case, which I personally think is better anyways.

Read full topic
